10400.name: Dead End Butcher
desc: · When not in a Stunned state, Boss enemies gain 1 stack of All Or Nothing every 6s, stacking up to 3 stacks. Each stack of All Or Nothing increases the damage dealt by the Boss enemy by 10%. When an Agent's attack hits an enemy, the Agent's CRIT DMG increases by 25% for each stack of All Or Nothing the target has. All Or Nothing stacks will be reset when the enemy recovers from being Stunned.

· When the Agent hits the boss enemy with a Defensive Assist or Chain Attack, they apply 1 stack of Weakening to the target. For each stack of Weakening on the target, Agent CRIT DMG is increased by 10%. When the boss enemy has 4 stacks of Weakening, Defensive Assist will deflect the boss enemy's attack, causing a Stagger effect.
perf: · Successfully triggering Perfect Dodge grants 150 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully triggering Perfect Assist grants 300 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

10403.name: Unknown Corruption Complex
desc: · When dealing sufficient DMG to the boss enemy's legs, IMPAIRED!! will be triggered. Upon successfully breaking the boss enemy's legs, the Agent restores 1000 Decibels, and the boss gains 1 stack of Disintegration for 20 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 stacks. When the Agent's attacks hit an enemy, for each stack of Disintegration the target has, CRIT DMG is increased by 25%.

· When dealing sufficient DMG to the boss enemy's legs, IMPAIRED!! will be triggered. Upon successfully breaking the boss enemy's legs, the Agent restores 1000 Decibels, and the boss gains 1 stack of Disintegration for 20 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 stacks. When the Agent's attacks hit an enemy, for each stack of Disintegration the target has, CRIT DMG is increased by 25%.
perf: · Successfully causing IMPAIRED!! grants 800 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully causing IMPAIRED!! grants 800 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

12400.name: Corrupted Overlord: Pompey
desc: · Boss enemies gain 1 stack of Battle-Hardened every 10s, increasing their DMG dealt by 20% and stacking up to 3 times. When inflicting Attribute Anomaly, removes 1 stack of Battle-Hardened and increases their DMG taken by 15% for 20s.

· Boss enemies gain 1 stack of Battle-Hardened every 10s, increasing their DMG dealt by 20% and stacking up to 3 times. When inflicting Attribute Anomaly, removes 1 stack of Battle-Hardened and increases their DMG taken by 15% for 20s.
perf: · Successfully inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies grants 150 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully triggering Perfect Dodge grants 200 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

14400.name: Notorious: Marionette
desc: · DMG dealt by Boss enemies increases by 25%. When a clone is destroyed or when the main body is stunned, 1/5 stacks of On Thin Ice is inflicted on Boss enemies respectively. Each stack of On Thin Ice decreases the DMG dealt by the Boss by 5% and increases the Ice DMG and Electric DMG dealt to the Boss by Agents by 10%. On Thin Ice stacks will be reset when the enemy recovers from Stun.

· DMG dealt by Boss enemies increases by 25%. When a clone is destroyed or when the main body is stunned, 1/5 stacks of On Thin Ice is inflicted on Boss enemies respectively. Each stack of On Thin Ice decreases the DMG dealt by the Boss by 5% and increases the Ice DMG and Ether DMG dealt to the Boss by Agents by 10%. On Thin Ice stacks will be reset when the enemy recovers from Stun.
perf: · Successfully destroying a dance partner grants 200 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully destroying a dance partner grants 200 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

14401.name: Notorious: Pompey
desc: · When not in a Stunned state, Boss enemies gain 1 stack of All Or Nothing every 6s, stacking up to 3 stacks. Each stack of All Or Nothing increases the damage dealt by the Boss enemy by 10%. When an Agent's attack hits an enemy, the Agent's CRIT DMG increases by 25% for each stack of All Or Nothing the target has. All Or Nothing stacks will be reset when the enemy recovers from being Stunned.

· When the Agent hits the boss enemy with a Defensive Assist or Chain Attack, they apply 1 stack of Weakening to the target. For each stack of Weakening on the target, Agent CRIT DMG is increased by 10%. When the boss enemy has 4 stacks of Weakening, Defensive Assist will deflect the boss enemy's attack, causing a Stagger effect.
perf: · Successfully triggering Perfect Dodge grants 200 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully triggering Perfect Assist grants 300 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

14402.name: Sacrfice: Bringer
desc: · When inflicting an Attribute Anomaly or Disorder on a boss enemy, all squad members gain 1 stack of Laser Focus, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack of Laser Focus increases the Agent's CRIT Rate by 5%. With at least 3 stacks of Laser Focus, inflicting an Attribute Anomaly will increase its duration by 5s. When Sacrifice: Bringer attacks with his Sacrificial Knife, all squad members' Laser Focus stacks will be reset.

· When inflicting an Attribute Anomaly or Disorder on a boss enemy, all squad members gain 1 stack of Laser Focus, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack of Laser Focus increases the Agent's ATK by 8%. With at least 3 stacks of Laser Focus, inflicting an Attribute Anomaly will increase its duration by 5s. When Sacrifice: Bringer attacks with his Sacrificial Knife, all squad members' Laser Focus stacks will be reset.
perf: · Successfully interrupting a chant grants 2000 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully interrupting a chant grants 2000 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

14403.name: Typhon Destroyer
desc: · Agents inflict Overwhelmed when landing a Defensive Assist hit against a Boss enemy, and 3 stacks of Overwhelmed when accumulating 3 Defensive Assist hits and triggering IMPAIRED!!. Each stack of Overwhelmed increases Daze by 15%, and Chain Attack and Ultimate DMG taken while Stunned by 10%. The enemy will fix the impaired parts and reset the impairment level while charging, and will reset its Overwhelmed stacks after recovering from Stun.

· Agents inflict Overwhelmed when landing a Defensive Assist hit against a Boss enemy, and 3 stacks of Overwhelmed when accumulating 3 Defensive Assist hits and triggering IMPAIRED!!. Each stack of Overwhelmed increases Daze by 15%, and Chain Attack and Ultimate DMG taken while Stunned by 10%. The enemy will fix the impaired parts and reset the impairment level while charging, and will reset its Overwhelmed stacks after recovering from Stun.
perf: · Successfully imparing an enemy grants 600 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.

· Successfully triggering a Perfect Assist grants 200 Performance Points
. Successfully causing IMPAIRED!! grants 600 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
14403.misc: · Assist Points are not consumed for this battle.

15400.name: Notorious: Dead End Butcher
desc: · DMG dealt to boss enemies by Attribute Anomaly is increased by 50%. While Notorious: Dead End Butcher is in Ether Enhanced state, the DMG it takes is reduced by 15%, and the Daze value dealt by Agents to it is reduced by 30%. Triggering Disorder on Notorious: Dead End Butcher immediately forces it to exit the Ether Enhanced state.

· DMG dealt to boss enemies by Attribute Anomaly is increased by 50%. While Notorious: Dead End Butcher is in Ether Enhanced state, the DMG it takes is reduced by 15%, and the Daze value dealt by Agents to it is reduced by 30%. Triggering Disorder on Notorious: Dead End Butcher immediately forces it to exit the Ether Enhanced state.
perf: · Successfully triggering Perfect Dodge grants 200 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· Successfully inflicting Disorder grants 200 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000.

20400.name: Miasma Priest
desc: · When the Miasma Priest switches phase, their Anomaly Buildup RES increases by 10% and CRIT DMG taken increases by 30%. This effect can stack up to 2 times and is cleared when Miasmic Shield breaks.
· When the Miasma Priest switches phase, their Anomaly Buildup RES increases by 10% and CRIT DMG taken increases by 30%. This effect can stack up to 2 times and is cleared when Miasmic Shield breaks.
perf: · When an Agent successfully performs 3 Defensive Assists within 3 seconds, earn 1000 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
· When an Agent successfully performs 3 Defensive Assists within 3 seconds, earn 1000 Performance Points. A maximum of 5000 Performance Points can be obtained.
20400.misc: · Suitable for Agents with Rupture specialty.

21400.name: Miasmic Fiend: Unfathomable
desc: · When Miasmic Fiend is affected by Attribute Anomaly, it takes 8% bonus Anomaly DMG from Agents, stacking up to 6 times; activating Miasmic Shield clears all stacks, with each stack increasing the reduction efficiency of Miasmic Shield by 2.5%.

· When Miasmic Fiend is affected by Attribute Anomaly, it takes 8% bonus Anomaly DMG from Agents, stacking up to 6 times; activating Miasmic Shield clears all stacks, with each stack increasing the reduction efficiency of Miasmic Shield by 2.5%.
perf: · When Agents bait Miasmic Fiend's ground attack into detonating at least 5 Miasma Pools at once and avoid being hit by the attack and pool explosions, they will earn 1,700 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000.

· When Agents bait Miasmic Fiend's ground attack into detonating at least 5 Miasma Pools at once and avoid being hit by the attack and pool explosions, they will earn 1,700 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000.
21400.misc: · Suitable for Agents with Anomaly specialty.

22400.name: The Defiler
desc:
· When an Agent hits The Defiler with Defensive Assist, the whole squad gains 1 stack of Adjudication; when an Agent knocks down The Defiler attacking in mid-air, the whole squad gains 4 stacks of Adjudication. Adjudication can stack up to 6 times and lasts for 30 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
· For each stack of Adjudication, the Agent's CRIT DMG is increased by 8%.
· The Defiler receives 25% less Attribute Anomaly DMG.

· When an Agent hits The Defiler with Defensive Assist, the whole squad gains 1 stack of Adjudication; when an Agent knocks down The Defiler attacking in mid-air, the whole squad gains 4 stacks of Adjudication. Adjudication can stack up to 6 times and lasts for 30 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
· For each stack of Adjudication, the Agent's CRIT DMG is increased by 8%.
· The Defiler receives 25% less Attribute Anomaly DMG.
perf: · When an Agent causes IMPAIRED!! status, they gain 2500 Performance Points; when an Agent shoots down The Defiler while it's attacking in mid-air, they gain 1500 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000 Performance Points.

· When an Agent causes IMPAIRED!! status, they gain 2500 Performance Points; when an Agent shoots down The Defiler while it's attacking in mid-air, they gain 1500 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000 Performance Points.
22400.misc: · Suitable for Agents with Attack specialty.

23400.name: Wandering Hunter
desc:
· Wandering Hunter's Base DEF increases by 40% in Miasma Field; when Agent hits Wandering Hunter with Assist Follow-Up or Dodge Counter, applies 1 stack of Wavering. Wavering can stack up to 5 times and lasts 15 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration.
· When Agent's attacks hit Wandering Hunter, for each stack of Wavering, Agent's Sheer DMG is increased by 7%.

· Wandering Hunter's Base DEF increases by 40% in Miasma Field; when Agent hits Wandering Hunter with Assist Follow-Up or Dodge Counter, applies 1 stack of Wavering. Wavering can stack up to 5 times and lasts 15 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration.
· When Agent's attacks hit Wandering Hunter, for each stack of Wavering, Agent's Sheer DMG is increased by 7%.
perf: · During the hide-and-seek phase, using Perception Technique to break through Drowned Ideal Lucia's true form will earn you 3000 Performance Points; after breaking through the true form, successfully countering the Wandering Hunter's ambush with Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist will earn you 2000 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000 Performance Points.

· During the hide-and-seek phase, using Perception Technique to break through Drowned Ideal Lucia's true form will earn you 3000 Performance Points; after breaking through the true form, successfully countering the Wandering Hunter's ambush with Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist will earn you 2000 Performance Points, up to a maximum of 5000 Performance Points.
23400.misc: · Suitable for Agents with Rupture specialty.
